description: Tasty and easy to make, these fish pies will be an instant family favourite.
name: Basa Fish Pies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g basa fillets, lightly cooked and flaked
2 stick celery, washed and diced approx 2cm
100g carrot, peeled and diced approx 2 cm
800g potatoes-peeled and mashed with a knob of butter and cream to mix
pinch sea salt and black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the butter in a small pot, add the flour all at once and stir for approx. 1 minute on low heat-don't burn it.
Mix the cream, wine and milk together and slowly add to the butter and flour mix, stir until smooth and thick, season with salt and pepper and set aside.
In a frypan, saut√© the onion, garlic, carrot and celery in olive oil on low heat until softened and cooked right through.
Mix the fish, dill, vegetables and sauce, divide mix between ramekins.
Place the creamy mash on top of each ramekin and top with some parmesan cheese and chopped parsley.
Bake in oven 160 c for about 15-18 mins or until golden, Serve piping hot with a nice salad or vegetables, enjoy!
